description: Eli Roth's cinematic family tree is growing, from sponsoring and encouraging filmmakers he's discovered at horror conventions (GRACE's Paul Solet) to developing talent ready to take the next step into the show. In 2012, Fantastic Fest showcased the US premiere of Roth collaborator Nicolás López earthquake thriller AFTERSHOCK, and this year will feature Guillermo Amoedo's English language debut THE STRANGER. López and Amoedo worked with Roth on 2013 FF favorite THE GREEN INFERNO as well as his upcoming KNOCK KNOCK.
synopsis: A mysterious man returns to his home after sixteen years, which jumpstarts a bizarre and deadly chain of events.
title: The Stranger
